name: Joel Pittet's Drupal.org Styles
description: Trying to clean things up on Drupal.org
additional_info:
You can do a pull request and make some changes yourselves at https://github.com/joelpittet/drupalorg-userstyles

https://github.com/joelpittet/drupalorg-userstyles

* Removes link to the homepage (logo does this well).
* Removes the chrome for a flat UI.
* Tidy up the section title so it's not as prominent.
* Adjust the hierarchy of the typography.
* Try to make the tabs have some structure to the page.
